short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select or remove google fonts within the current active google fonts page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google Fonts Toggle is a simple chrome extension to help users toggle selection on all the fonts on the current Google Fonts page. 

Being a developer and trying multiple fonts on various projects, I usually waste around 2 seconds of my precious time selecting all the fonts from a google page. But with this tool, I can save those precious seconds to use them on searching a google youtube video to watch. I hope this saves you similar amount of time but you use those saved moments wisely.
